document_data.name: Lionheart
document_data.level3e: {{spell table|edition=3e|[[Initiate of the Holy Realm]]|2|[[Initiate of Nobanion]]|2|}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Lionheart''''' was a [[Divine magic|divine]] [[abjuration]] and [[illusion]] [[spell]] used by specialty priests devoted to [[Nobanion]] called [[Firemane]]s to instill courage in others.
document_data.Effects:
This spell filled the target or targets with the heart of a [[lion]]. Those under the influence of ''lionheart'' were immune to all forms of magical ''[[fear]]'' and would never flee from the threat of danger. Additionally, this spell would instantly remove any lingering magical or nonmagical fear within the target.

This spell had no effect on the [[undead]].
document_data.Components: In addition to [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s, this spell required as [[material component]]s a tuft of hair from a lion or similar creature such as a [[wemic]] to cast.
